# spatial3D

**Type Property**

Displays the image’s spatial 3D representation (if generated) with a windowed presentation style.

## Declaration

```swift
static let spatial3D: ImagePresentationComponent.ViewingMode
```

## 3D presentation of generated spatial scenes

- **spatial3DImmersive**: Displays the image’s spatial 3D representation (if generated) with an immersive presentation style.
